text:
üë§Head of Influence Team / Growth Lead (YouTube), Fully remote

About company:
üî∏Fundmates.co is a fintech platform for YouTube creators in the USA, where creators raise funds to develop their channels. 
üî∏We are building a new Growth team whose main task will be to help creators grow on YouTube using various tools ‚Äî content, services, AI, optimisations, etc. 

Responsibilities will be:
üî∏Regular data collection and channel audits to identify areas for improvement (using VidIQ, Social Blade and other tools).
üî∏Development and implementation of hypotheses to stimulate growth.
üî∏Technical analysis of channels, including SEO and AdSense.
üî∏Maintaining active contact with creators to achieve success collaboratively.
üî∏Goal: Achieve 3-5% growth per month for each creator cohort.

Requirements:
üî∏Deep knowledge of YouTube, both in terms of content and technical aspects.
üî∏Passion for data analysis and managing YouTube channels.
üî∏English proficiency level not lower than B2. Russian as a big plus. 
üî∏Excellent communication skills.
üî∏Work experience in MCN companies as a plus. 

What We Offer:
üî∏Competitive salary in USD.
üî∏Fully remote work with the possibility of relocation to the USA.
üî∏Opportunity to become a department head and build your own team within 1-2 years.

Salary:
üî∏$2000 - $4000 

Contact: to apply for a vacancy click the button below üì©
